books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Lucas Davenport is on the trail of killers who have targeted a group of vagabonds called the Travelers.
books.name: GATHERING PREY

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A police detective who left the force when his family was murdered teams up with his former partner to solve the case.
books.name: MEMORY MAN

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: After her husband’s death, a woman returns with her daughter to her Smoky Mountain hometown, only to discover that her husband was a fraud who implicated her in his deceptions.
books.name: THE LIAR

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: Two newcomers to a California town find their attentions drifting toward each other.
books.name: HOLD ME

books.author: by Iris Johansen
books.description: A C.I.A. operative becomes the target of someone from her past intent on killing those who were once close to her.
books.name: YOUR NEXT BREATH

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one struggling to survive in the countryside, the other joining the Resistance in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Characters’ lives begin to fall apart as a mysterious stranger discloses secrets to them; a stand-alone thriller.
books.name: THE STRANGER

books.author: by Greg Iles
books.description: The prosecutor Penn Cage’s attempt to find his father brings him up against the K.K.K.
books.name: THE BONE TREE

books.author: by Elle Kennedy
books.description: A college Lothario hopes for a second chance with a first-year student.
books.name: THE MISTAKE

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The lives of two couples converge unexpectedly.
books.name: THE LONGEST RIDE

books.author: by Denise Grover Swank
books.description: A woman looks into her birth mother's possible connection to a crime.
books.name: THIRTY-FOUR AND A HALF PREDICAMENTS

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: Claire Randall, an English nurse, is transported back to 1743 during a second honeymoon in the Scottish Highlands. There she begins an affair with James Fraser, a redheaded soldier. Originally published in 1991.
books.name: OUTLANDER

books.author: by R. L. Mathewson
books.description: Two longtime friends embark on a tentative relationship.
books.name: DOUBLE DARE
